class="ocsforge_color_keyword"|object>><<a_api subproject="client" text=".." | class Ow_jcrop.jcrop >><<span class="ocsforge_color_keyword"|end>>>>~Jcrop gives you crop tools to redefine an ~<img~> tag~. ~You have to pass~.
      this image as parameter to apply tools on it~.


      ~There are some parameters to configure the tools~. ~(description come from
      the original website~)~:
<<div class="odocwiki_param_info"|<<span class="code"|on_select>> : ~Called when selection is completed~.>>
<<div class="odocwiki_param_info"|<<span class="code"|on_change>> : ~Called when the selection is moving~.>>
<<div class="odocwiki_param_info"|<<span class="code"|on_release>> : ~Jcrop has a sense of state~, whether there is an active selection or not~. this is called when the selection is released~.>>
<<div class="odocwiki_param_info"|<<span class="code"|aspect_ratio>> : ~Aspect ratio of w~/h ~(e~.g~. ~1 for square~)~.>>
<<div class="odocwiki_param_info"|<<span class="code"|min_size>> : ~Minimum width~/height~, use ~0 for unbounded dimension~.>>
<<div class="odocwiki_param_info"|<<span class="code"|max_size>> : ~Maximum width~/height~, use ~0 for unbounded dimension~.>>
<<div class="odocwiki_param_info"|<<span class="code"|set_select>> : ~Set an initial selection area~.>>
<<div class="odocwiki_param_info"|<<span class="code"|bg_color>> : ~Set color of background container ~(default~: "black"~)~.>>
<<div class="odocwiki_param_info"|<<span class="code"|bg_opacity>> : ~Opacity of outer image when cropping ~(default~: ~0~.~6~)~.>>
